pages.text: The focus feels gooey by touch, but it does not seem to secrete any goo whatsoever. The same cannot be said to the creature it can summon, $(l:summons/enderling_servants#snareling)a gangly caricature of humanity with long arms, a jaw on its chest and a glowing back-sac$().
Casting with $(l:crafts/staff/void_staff)Void Staff$() summons more snarelings at once.
